feat.value: to every pain which is down upon me.
But for the little girls which we have heard about,
that they ran to each other in a desire of flesh.
Tell me about them assuredly, that I may know
And I will tell you what it is that you will do to them.
But also because of that which you said about her,
to make her go to the place that you determined for her,
to make her do her deed in it, while she had said to you:
If you take me out of this place and into that one
'I will not do anything about the thing that I did to him.'
And if she did not truly desire it
then tell me, I will teach you what you will do to her.
But all of you, if you hide a deception from us on your behalf so as not to tell us about it,
what you awaken is Satan upon you yourselves
And it is by yourselves that you turn away from the help of God.
Here is the old man, I have sent him to you in this other time as long as we exist.
